about_the_game:
ARKHAM MYSTERIES: CHAPTER ONE

Explore the Unseen in Arkham Mysteries: Chapter One

Embark on a narrative adventure filled with mystery and exploration in Arkham Mysteries: Chapter One. Solve intricate puzzles as you uncover dark secrets in a world inspired by Lovecraft’s myths, where every decision brings you closer to the truth or drags you into madness.

Key Features and Gameplay:

  • First-Person Exploration: Immerse yourself in a dark world full of mysteries.

  • Meaningful Choices: Every decision impacts the game’s outcome.

  • Dimensional Travel: Use the Eye of Kadath to uncover secrets in hidden realities.

  • Intricate Puzzles: Challenge your logic with complex enigmas.

  • Lovecraftian Creatures: Survive cosmic horrors using your wits.

An Investigation That Defies the Impossible

In Arkham Mysteries: Chapter One, you play as a detective caught in a case that defies reason. The disappearance of Professor Wellington and his connection to the Oracle of the Deep Ones, a relic shrouded in legend, will lead you to a truth darker than you can imagine. With the power of the Eye of Kadath, you can cross into a hidden dimension full of ancient horrors and secrets that should never have been revealed. But are you ready to face what lies on the other side?
